add_worksheet.displayName: Add a Worksheet to a Workbook
add_worksheet.description: Add a worksheet to a workbook

props.name: worksheet_name
props.description: The name of the new worksheet

append_multiple_rows.description: Appends multiple row of values to a worksheet.

append_row.description: Append row of values to a worksheet

props.name: first_row_headers
props.displayName: Does the first row contain headers?
props.description: If the first row is headers

clear_range.description: Clear a block of cells (range) content or formatting.

props.name: range
props.description: The range of cells to clear, in A1 notation (e.g., "A1:C5").

props.name: applyTo
props.description: Specify what to clear from the range.

clear_column.description: Clear contents/formatting of a column by its index.

props.name: column_index
props.description: The 1-based index of the column to be cleared (e.g., 1 for column A, 2 for column B).

props.name: applyTo
props.description: Specify what to clear from the column.

clear_row.description: Clear contents/formatting of an entire row by its ID.

props.name: row_id
props.description: The number of the row to be cleared (e.g., 5 for the 5th row).

props.name: applyTo
props.description: Specify what to clear from the row.

props.name: range
props.description: The range in A1 notation (e.g., A2:B2) to clear in the worksheet, if not provided, clear the entire worksheet

convert_to_range.description: Converts a table to a range

create_table.description: Create a table in a worksheet

props.name: selectRange
props.description: How to select the range for the table

props.name: range
props.description: The range of cells in A1 notation (e.g., A2:B2) that will be converted to a table

props.name: hasHeaders
props.description: Whether the range has column labels

createWorkbook.description: Create a new workbook at the specified location

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the new workbook

create_worksheet.description: Add a new worksheet (tab) to an existing workbook with optional default headers.

props.name: name
props.description: The name for the new worksheet. If not provided, a default name like 'Sheet1' will be assigned.

props.name: headers
props.description: Optional: A list of headers to add to the first row. A table will be created from these headers.

delete_table.description: Delete a table from a worksheet

delete_worksheet.description: Delete a worksheet in a workbook

find_row.description: Locate a row by specifying a lookup column and value (e.g. find a row where “ID” = 123).

props.name: lookup_column
props.description: The column to search in.

props.name: lookup_value
props.description: The value to find in the lookup column.

find-workbook.description: Finds an existing workbook by name.

props.name: fileName
props.description: Excel File name to search for without extension.

find-worksheet.description: Finds an existing worksheet by name.

props.name: exactMatch
props.description: If true, only return worksheets that exactly match the name. If false, return worksheets that contain the name.

get_range.description: Retrieve the values in a given cell range (e.g., “A1:C10”).

props.name: range
props.description: The range of cells to retrieve, in A1 notation (e.g., "A1:C10").

getRowById.description: Retrieve the entire content of a row by its row ID.

props.name: row_id
props.description: The zero-based index of the row to retrieve (e.g., 0 for the first row, 1 for the second).

get_table_columns.description: List columns of a table in a worksheet

props.name: limit
props.description: Limit the number of columns retrieved

get_table_rows.description: List rows of a table in a worksheet

props.name: limit
props.description: Limit the number of rows retrieved

props.name: limit
props.description: Limits the number of workbooks returned, returns all workbooks if empty

get_worksheet.description: Retrieve metadata of a worksheet by its ID.

props.name: range
props.description: Range of the rows to retrieve (e.g., A2:B2)

props.name: headerRow
props.description: Row number of the header

props.name: firstDataRow
props.description: Row number of the first data row

props.name: useFilter
props.description: Enables the column wise filter.

props.name: returnAll
props.description: If checked, all worksheets will be returned

props.name: limit
props.description: Limit the number of worksheets returned

lookup_table_column.description: Lookup a value in a table column in a worksheet

props.name: lookup_column
props.description: The column name to lookup the value in

props.name: lookup_value
props.description: The value to lookup

props.name: return_all_matches
props.description: If checked, all matching rows will be returned

rename_worksheet.description: Change the name of an existing worksheet.

update_row.description: Update a row in a worksheet

props.name: row_number
props.description: The row number to update

props.name: first_row_headers
props.displayName: Does the first row contain headers?
props.description: If the first row is headers
